Adam Koniuszewski
UI/UX designer

Helping bring digital products & ideas to life

Reading Time: 3 minutes
Get in touch
With many years of experience both in an agency environment

Hi, I'm Adam Koniuszewski, a digital product designer.

I have been working as a designer and front-end developer since 2004. With many years of experience both in an agency environment and as a self employed freelancer, I have designed, developed and managed a wide range of web projects, from small websites for local businesses to multi-million pound e-commerce applications.

I love a challenge; the more complex the better. For me there is nothing more rewarding than taking a complicated problem, breaking it down and delivering a beautifully simple solution.

Ultimately, all of my work is all about helping businesses bring their digital product & service ideas to life. I help business owners improve the digital experience of their users and help them adapt to the ever-changing digital landscape. I’m passionate about creating simple, digital experiences that make people’s lives better.

With many years of experience both in an agency environment

I could have shown you here some “pretty examples” of the past projects that I have worked on but I've realised that they might be irrelevant to you (they are solutions to somebody’s else problem).

I love making beautiful visuals but it’s not what drives me. What drives me is underlying user needs. I want to create something that actually solves their problems. Feel free to have a sneak peek at what I’m currently working on here.

I like to believe that the work I do makes a difference to both individuals and businesses in a variety of industries. I work with people who aren’t afraid of new ideas but more importantly, believe in them and want to make them happen.

What I can bring to your team

UI / UX Design

Users evaluate a design in 50 milliseconds. I will help you make those first few milliseconds count.

  • UX Prototyping
  • User Research and Testing
  • Design Systems
  • User Interface Design

Digital Strategy

I’ll work with you to understand your business and make sure everything we do aligns with your goals.

  • Research and discovery
  • Digital audit
  • Recommendations and roadmap

Branding & Identity Design

I’ll help you create the look, the feel, and the tone of your brand.

  • Brand Strategy
  • Brand Guidelines
  • Marketing Materials

Back in the day, I thought I am going to be an artist. I was quite good at it (I even had a few exhibitions and won few awards for it) but now I’m just mediocre.

I am living in Manchester, UK with my wife Ruth and our 2 daughters (Magda and Florence) and I am working as a Head of User Experience at Built By Pixel where I work with our development team to make digital tools for our clients a bit better, smarter and easier to use.

I occasionally post to Dribbble, Twitter and Instagram. I read articles on Medium.

If you would like to say hello or discuss a potential project then please drop me a line.

Frequesntly Asked Questions

Do you code?

I believe in goals, not tools but I always tinker with code and explore ways how technology can help us be more efficient and have better lives. Although I feel a bit overwhelmed by the current state of front-end eco-system.

What are you working on currently?

I seem always to have few projects "on the plate" (either client or personal ones). At the moment, among a few others, I’m helping online travel retailer redesign they existing website and improve the user experience. I am also helping a London-based startup bring they new property-based idea to life.

What tools do you use?

Firefox is my main browser. I use Sketch and Principle for all my UI work, Sublime Text 3 for when I am editing a code and iTerm2 when interacting with a command line. I use Todoist to organise my tasks and BearApp for writing. I use git and Github/Bitbucket for code versioning.

Have you read anything interesting recently?

Sure. I am obsessed with reading and always exploring some Medium articles. Also, my Kindle is one of the gadgets I can’t imagine living without. The book that I am enjoying reading at the moment is Do no harm by Tony Marsh. Here are few other things I’ve read and liked recently.

Have a question? Drop me a line. I would love to hear from you.
